trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Oceanside
There were 2 other sightings in Oceanside on or around April 8th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter actually witnessed this event alone tonight. Just 2 nights ago, our entire family witnessed these same lights. They appeared again tonight at about the same time, but this time there were only 2, not 4, extremely bright diamond shaped lights. This time they hovered lower and a bit closer than last time, according to my daughter. I have a feeling they will be making more appearances in this area. We really want to know what's going on...
Summary: Second sighting of 2 diamond-shaped golden lights in Carlsbad, CA
